title: Smart Data Models - RAMI4.0 Asset Administrtion Shell -AAS- Generic Submodel schema
description: Describes a generic RAMI4.0 SubmodelElement representing an OPERATION (Command) of a referrenced Asset Administration Shell.

id.description: Property. Identity information that unambiguously distinguishes one AAS I4SubmodelElementOperation from another one within the NGSI context

type.description: Property. It has to be RAMI4.0 I4SubmodelElementOperation NGSI Entity type to represent a RAMI4.0 AAS Digital Twin Submodel Operation component

refI4AssetId.description: Referecence. References the root Asset which this SubmodelElement belongs to

refI4AASId.description: Reference. References the root Asset Administration Shell which this SubmodelElement belongs to

refI4SubmodelId.description: Reference. References the root Submodel which this SubmodelElement belongs to

hasDataSpecification.description: Property. Data specification defines the additional attributes a Submodel Element may have. RAMI4.0 specification

idShort.description: Property. short id is the (short) name of the SubmodelElement within RAMI40 environment

category.description: Property. The category is a value that gives further meta information w.r.t. to the class of the element

modelType.description: Property. For the distinction of 'type' and 'instance', the term 'kind' is used.

name.description: Property. Property of the item. Usually -Operation- is set for this type.

descriptions.description: Property. For adding detailed knowldedge about the Element in different languages

language.description: Property. Substring identifying the language. Acronym according to ISO 639-1

text.description: Property. The Description text is filled here

semanticId.description: Property. It refers to an external information source, which explains the formulation of the submodel element

kind.description: Property. For the distinction of 'type' and 'instance', the term 'kind' is used

requestId.description: Property. Client request ID sent -for INPUT- and/or the retrieved value/status -for OUTPUT-. Used to TRACK the operations

timeout.description: Property. Represents the timeout value for this command reported by the OPC-UA server

inputVariable.description: Property. Array with input parameters of the operation.

items.description: Defines an Input variable for this command request

value.description: The given value in string format.
